entries.statement: The city of Cendreville has been buried under volcanic ash for 400 years but remains inhabited underground
Cartographer Lena draws a new map every dawn, working from memory and observation
Streets that are not mapped by sunrise cease to exist
Three districts have already been lost to unmapping in the last decade
Beneath the city lies a void that absorbs forgotten places
Lena's predecessor disappeared after trying to map the void itself

intent.message: What we refuse to forget can become a prison
intent.premise: In a city buried under volcanic ash for centuries, a cartographer discovers that the streets rearrange themselves at night, and the map she draws each morning is the only thing keeping the city from collapsing into the void beneath.
intent.title: La Ville sous la Cendre
